prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon that carries a large log and has a pink accent.
I want a Fighting-type Pokemon with a sturdy build and a playful personality.
Generate a small-sized Pokemon that uses a heavy stick as a weapon in battles.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a construction worker with a beige body and pink details.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forests, showcasing its strength and determination.
Design a playful Pokemon that is often found in urban areas, training with its tools.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves from a humble worker into a powerful fighter.
